title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 562.11 - Maintenance, special events and emergencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 562.11 - Maintenance, special events and emergencies

State Regulations
(a) Instructions relative to temporary
parking restrictions to facilitate snow removal, cleanup, maintenance and
repair will be forthcoming from time to time from the university police
department as the need arises. (b) On special occasions and emergencies, parking restrictions will be regulated by
the university police department as required. (c) For certain college events, parking may
not be limited to parking lots. Specific roads and/ or areas not otherwise used
for parking may be designated for parking by the university police
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
562.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
